meanings.definition: An optical instrument used for viewing extremely small particles.
meanings.sent1: Under the ultramicroscope, the tiny particles looked huge.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use the ultramicroscope to study minuscule objects.
meanings.sent3: The ultramicroscope made the speck of dust seem like a giant boulder!
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was like an ultramicroscope, catching every small mistake.
meanings.sent5: The ultramicroscope revealed a hidden world of microscopic wonders.

meanings.definition: To view particles using an ultramicroscope.
meanings.sent1: He will ultramicroscope the sample to analyze its composition.
meanings.sent2: They ultramicroscoped the cells to observe their structure.
meanings.sent3: She decided to ultramicroscope the dust particles for fun.
meanings.sent4: The detective ultramicroscoped the evidence to find clues.
meanings.sent5: We need to ultramicroscope the material to understand its properties better.
